name: Box Town Inc.
description:
NOW HIRING!

At BoxTown Inc, we always deliver!  Now you can too! Join us in our mission to deliver precious packages to the precious folk of BoxTown.

Job Requirements: 
  • Ability to throw stuff. Really hard. 
  • Unwavering courage in the face of oncoming traffic. 
  • Can kinda drive. 

At BoxTown Inc, we guarantee safe delivery, all the time …usually!

📦 🚛 📦 🚚 

Box Town Inc. is a casual, endless runner in a quaint hand-drawn setting. Features:
  • Casual Endless Delivery
  • Generative Levels
  • Package Loving Town
  • Hand-drawn folk

 🚛 📦🚚 📦

Keep in Touch
  • Help us shape sandbox mode!
